message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $150. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $140, a special discount just for you. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a piece worth more than what you're paying for. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.
